topic.title: Searching
topic.section:
(Please note that this help page refers explicitly to the Zend Search plugin. Further advice on searching is available on the more general {help_topic key="index.search" text="search page"}.)

The Zend Search plugin provides one field by default, labelled "All", which searches through the entire Zend or Lucene database. The Administrator may also specify further searchable fields to be used across the database.
